General.Name: Zhuhai Zhongfu Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuhai Zhongfu Enterprise Co.,Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells PET beverage packaging materials in China. The company provides packaging PET bottles, PET preforms, labels, outer packaging films, and plastic cans for carbonated beverages, hot-filled beverages, drinking water, and beer. It also offers OEM drinking water and beverage OEM services. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
